review: I went at sight n smile due to toothache and wanted to tooth to be removed. After examination doctor Anjali singh said if already lot of teeth already removed before,If will do more how can you eat. So she did the treatment and really amazing my pain gone and my teeth is intact.Even now I can eat without fear. Nice feeling.

I was apprehensive during smiling,because of broken  dental problem. But after treatment at sight n smile by Dr.Anaji singh my family got shocked by seeing my teeth,it becomes so good looking.*** ** ** ****** ** *** ***** ********* I gratefully recommend everyone.

She is wonderful. Very very smart at her work and very transparent. I highly recommend her. 
I went there for a checkup of my broken wisdom teeth. She recommended to get it extracted. I was ready right then and she did it with so ease. She is 10 on 10 from my side. Thank you dear doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had unbearable pain at one upper teeth near the wisdom one and had hypersensitivity at a lower teeth. Dr. Anjali Singh diagonised the root case, eliminated/extracted the upper wisdom teeth and I hardly felt any pain. She applied fillings for other 2 teeths  wherein I felt hypersensitivity. 
I'm free from the pain now, recuperated. I would highly recommend her for quick diagnosis, affordable /low cost of treatment and friendliness, transparency.

Actually,It was a eye opening experience for me. I was totally feared when i entered the clinic, Generally the people think that Dentists are so cruel and they hardly care patients, It was totally opposite what i thought, She is very polite, A hardcore Professional and Great care for Patients. She made me comfortable and she talked with me throughout the procedure with a smiling face (Although it was covered).  I feel happy and satisfied that I chose Dr. Anjali for my problem.  After the treatment it is a WOW moment for me, I really thankful to Dr. Anjali for all her effort to bring my smile back.
I recommend to Dr Anjali if you have any kind of Dental Problem..Its a one stop place for every solution.. All the Best

Doctor is very helpful and explains each consequence and solution of the problem. My wisdom tooth was hurting my chick very badly, so ultimately I have to remove it. She performed all the tooth extraction process keeping me concern, talking to me so that I am diverted. I really liked the way she performs. I will strongly recommend of anyone us looking for any teeth issues

context: Dental Cavities,Tooth Decay,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review: Reading the reviews I went to the doctor. ***** *** ********* * ******* *** *** ***** ********* ** **** ***** ******** I do repent now. The RCT is done but the pain is still there. People might say it will go with time. But guys, its been 2 years already, the pain is still there. I do not recommend doing an RCT from her. If you need normal advice, you should go.
reply_text: Sorry for your sufferings. Have you done follow up for your problem. Regarding her knowledge. She has completed MDS after BDS, which is a specialised branch dealing with RCT. But if found any problem sight n smile Clinic is always welcome patients either new or old one, to solve the problems. So please feel free to visit sight n smile Clinic.

review:

We appreciate her for the way she treats the patient. Thanks to her.
Got good treatment , charges also reasonable.I am very happy after correction of my tooth loss. Homely environment.

Any dental problem anyone must visit here. She has amazing professional hand to take care of patient.

review: If you are searching for  a dentist near newtown area then you can definately consult Dr Anjali Singh.
She is very good and explains the problem clearly.she is very friendly with the patient.The clinic is also very clean.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Amazing experience with friendly ambience and professional approach. Good location and clinic timings as well
It was very nice and recommend every one . The doctor was very polite and staffs behavior was also excellent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy with the way my teeth look now. I had uneven teeth (small laterals) from childhood and visited so many dentists but Dr. Anjali gave me the easiest, inexpensive and most convenient solution. It took just an hour for the treatment and i am pretty happy with the result. Thank you.
Very professional analysis. Well satisfied with the whole service!! Definitely recommended. Thank you!!
Best dentist I met so far..for my mother. all the treatments done by her.. she is satisfied with quality treatment done. Wishing all success in her future endeavor..

I was booked the slot in advance but when i reached to reception, already doctor has given the appointment at my slot. I had to wait another 2-3 patient after which i got my turn. Its seems no use of this app if slot is not given to advance booked
reply_text: Sorry for the inconvenience happened to you. We try our best to maintain the time schedule. Sure,we will look into this matter. Thanks for sharing your experience.

review:
My front tooth was broken in accident. It was looking bad when laughing.
I visited sight n smile,Dr. Anjali Singh done the treatment and amazing,it is difficult to think that teeth was broken. Nice feeling now.Happily can recommend to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Anjali is so kind, he understand the issue ans also explain to us in easy way. I'm writing this comment on behalf of my Son Divit. he is also happy with the kind gesture of staff and doctor.
